languages.text: "Не убоюсь я тьмы, ибо свет зажжен во мне, и свет этот — вера в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Тебя{/g}. Не отступлю пред врагом, ибо нет врага страшнее трусости, и я одолею его..." {n}— Арджента молится вслух, одновременно проверяя снаряжение ловкими пальцами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не убоюсь я тьмы, ибо свет зажжен во мне, и свет этот — вера в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Тебя{/g}. Не отступлю пред врагом, ибо нет врага страшнее трусости, и я одолею его..." {n}— Арджента молится вслух, одновременно проверяя снаряжение ловкими пальцами.{/n}

languages.text: "I shall fear no darkness, for light is within me, the light of my faith in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Thee{/g}. I shall flee before no enemy, for there is no enemy more terrible than cowardice, and I shall overpower it..." {n}Argenta prays aloud, all the while checking her equipment with deft fingers.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich fürchte keine Dunkelheit, denn in mir ist Licht, das Licht meines Glaubens an den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}. Ich fliehe vor keinem Feind, denn kein Feind ist schrecklicher als Feigheit, und ich werde sie überwinden ..." {n}Argenta spricht ein lautes Gebet, während sie mit ihren geschickten Fingern ihre Ausrüstung überprüft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I shall fear no darkness, for light is within me, the light of my faith in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Thee{/g}. I shall flee before no enemy, for there is no enemy more terrible than cowardice, and I shall overpower it..." {n}Argenta prays aloud, all the while checking her equipment with deft fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte keine Dunkelheit, denn in mir ist Licht, das Licht meines Glaubens an den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}. Ich fliehe vor keinem Feind, denn kein Feind ist schrecklicher als Feigheit, und ich werde sie überwinden ..." {n}Argenta spricht ein lautes Gebet, während sie mit ihren geschickten Fingern ihre Ausrüstung überprüft.{/n}

languages.text: « Je ne craindrai point les ténèbres, car la lumière est en moi, la lumière de ma foi en {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Vous{/g}. Je ne fuirai devant aucun ennemi, car il n'est point d'ennemi plus terrible que la lâcheté, et je la surmonterai... » {n}Argenta prie à voix haute, tout en vérifiant son équipement de ses doigts habiles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I shall fear no darkness, for light is within me, the light of my faith in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Thee{/g}. I shall flee before no enemy, for there is no enemy more terrible than cowardice, and I shall overpower it..." {n}Argenta prays aloud, all the while checking her equipment with deft fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ne craindrai point les ténèbres, car la lumière est en moi, la lumière de ma foi en {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Vous{/g}. Je ne fuirai devant aucun ennemi, car il n'est point d'ennemi plus terrible que la lâcheté, et je la surmonterai... » {n}Argenta prie à voix haute, tout en vérifiant son équipement de ses doigts habiles.{/n}

languages.text: “我不会畏惧黑暗，因为我对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}您{/g}的虔信之光就在我心中。我不会在敌人面前退怯，因为怯懦才是最可怕的敌人。我必将战胜它……”{n}阿洁塔一边大声祷告，一边灵巧地检查她的装备。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I shall fear no darkness, for light is within me, the light of my faith in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Thee{/g}. I shall flee before no enemy, for there is no enemy more terrible than cowardice, and I shall overpower it..." {n}Argenta prays aloud, all the while checking her equipment with deft fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不会畏惧黑暗，因为我对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}您{/g}的虔信之光就在我心中。我不会在敌人面前退怯，因为怯懦才是最可怕的敌人。我必将战胜它……”{n}阿洁塔一边大声祷告，一边灵巧地检查她的装备。{/n}

languages.text: 「我は闇を恐れない、なぜなら光は我の中にあり、それは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}汝{/g}への信仰の光だから。我は敵の前で逃げることはない、なぜなら臆病さほど恐ろしい敵はなく、我はそれに打ち勝つから…」{n}アルジェンタは祈りを口にしながら、巧みな指で装備を確認している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I shall fear no darkness, for light is within me, the light of my faith in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Thee{/g}. I shall flee before no enemy, for there is no enemy more terrible than cowardice, and I shall overpower it..." {n}Argenta prays aloud, all the while checking her equipment with deft fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私は闇を恐れまない、なぜなら光は私の中にあり、それは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}汝{/g}への信仰の光です。私は敵の前で逃げることはない、なぜなら臆病さほど恐ろしい敵はなく、私はそれを打ち勝つでしょう…」{n}アルジェンタは祈りを口にしながら、巧みな指で装備を確認している。{/n}

languages.text: «No temeré a las tinieblas, porque la luz está dentro de mí, la luz de mi fe en {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Él{/g}. No huiré ante ningún enemigo, porque no hay enemigo más terrible que la cobardía, y la venceré...». {n}Argenta reza en voz alta, mientras comprueba su equipo con sus hábiles dedos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I shall fear no darkness, for light is within me, the light of my faith in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Thee{/g}. I shall flee before no enemy, for there is no enemy more terrible than cowardice, and I shall overpower it..." {n}Argenta prays aloud, all the while checking her equipment with deft fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No temeré a las tinieblas, porque la luz está dentro de mí, la luz de mi fe en {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ella{/g}. No huiré ante ningún enemigo, porque no hay enemigo más terrible que la cobardía, y la venceré...». {n}Argenta reza en voz alta, mientras comprueba su equipo con sus hábiles dedos.{/n}

languages.text: "İçimde bu ışık, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O'na{/g} olan inancımın nuru varken karanlık beni ürkütemez. Hiçbir düşmandan kaçmam zira en beter düşmandır korkaklık ve bana boyun eğdiremez." {n}Argenta yüksek sesle dua ederken bir yandan da hızla ekipmanını yokluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I shall fear no darkness, for light is within me, the light of my faith in {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Thee{/g}. I shall flee before no enemy, for there is no enemy more terrible than cowardice, and I shall overpower it..." {n}Argenta prays aloud, all the while checking her equipment with deft fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İçimdeki nur varken karanlık beni ürkütemez. Bu parlak nur, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O{/g}'na inancımdan doğmuştur. Hiçbir düşmandan kaçmam, korkaklıktan daha beter düşman yoktur ve onu da mağlup ederim..." {n}Argenta yüksek sesle şekilde dua ederken bir yandan da hızla ekipmanını yokluyor.{/n}
